description:
PLEASE READ AND ANSWER ME THESE QUESTIONS.
HOW CAN BLACK PEOPLE TRUST ANY NARRATIVE COMING FROM WHITE PEOPLE?

How many white people have we seen try to police BLACK PEOPLE? 
How many white people have we seen lie on BLACK PEOPLE? 
How many times have we seen the media lie on BLACK PEOPLE?
How many time have we seen the police lie on BLACK PEOPLE?
HOW MANY YEARS HAS A WHITE CONTROL MEDIA CREATING A NARRATIVE OF LIES ON BLACK PEOPLE?
BLACK PEOPLE CAN NOT TRUST ANY NARRATIVE FROM WHITE PEOPLE ABOUT US. If you are black and believe anything coming from them you are lost. WE CAN NO LONGER LIVE ON WHAT THEY CONSIDER RIGHT AND WRONG. Especially when they do not hold their own to the same standards when they do things to us. WAKE UP MY PEOPLE PLEASE.

#GeorgeFloyd
#AhmaudArbery
#SeanReed
#BreonaTaylor 
#POPULATIONCONTROL
